name: BOW-WOW RESCUE
description:
BOW-WOW RESCUE is a game made with p5.js.

The story begins with meeting a dog who escaped from the puppy farm. The dog asks you to follow him and rescue his friends from bad breeders. 

Guide his way and collect items to keep him running. Save poor dogs and puppies to make them escape, live a better life!

This game was made to raise awareness of animal rights and welfare. I hope by playing this game, you can think again about what you can do to help them. 

- HOW TO PLAY -

  • Collect items that are essential for dogs to keep their lives
  • Avoid items that are poisonous to dogs
  • Stamina   keeps decreasing while playing the game, collect good items to boost the stamina
  • If the stamina becomes 0, the game is over

Press LEFT ARROW[◀︎]  to guide the dog to the left

Press RIGHT ARROW[▶︎]  to guide the dog to the right
